SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT F.IDX, F.ACCOUNT_ID, F.SUBJECT, F.SITE, TO_CHAR(F.START_DAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS START_DAY, TO_CHAR(F.END_DAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS END_DAY, F.ADDRESS1, F.ADDRESS2, F.ADDRESS3, F.HOST, F.MAIN_IMG, F.SUB_IMG, F.TARGET, TO_CHAR(F.FUNDING_START, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS FUNDING_START, TO_CHAR(F.FUNDING_END, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS FUNDING_END, F.STATE, F.OPTION1, F.OPTION2, F.OPTION3, F.OPTION4, F.INDEX_SHOW2, E.AVGSTAR FROM FESTIVAL F LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FESTIVAL_IDX, AVG(STAR) AS AVGSTAR FROM EXPECT GROUP BY FESTIVAL_IDX ) E ON F.IDX = E.FESTIVAL_IDX WHERE F.STATE = 2 AND AVGSTAR IS NOT NULL )

SELECT IDX, ACCOUNT_ID, SUBJECT, SITE, TO_CHAR(START_DAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS START_DAY, TO_CHAR(END_DAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS END_DAY, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ADDRESS3, HOST, MAIN_IMG, SUB_IMG, TARGET, TO_CHAR(FUNDING_START, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS FUNDING_START, TO_CHAR(FUNDING_END, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS FUNDING_END, STATE, OPTION1, OPTION2, OPTION3, OPTION4 FROM FESTIVAL WHERE STATE = 0 AND ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ORDER BY IDX DESC

SELECT IDX, ACCOUNT_ID, SUBJECT, SITE, TO_CHAR(START_DAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS START_DAY, TO_CHAR(END_DAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS END_DAY, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ADDRESS3, HOST, MAIN_IMG, SUB_IMG, TARGET, TO_CHAR(FUNDING_START, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS FUNDING_START, TO_CHAR(FUNDING_END, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS FUNDING_END, STATE, OPTION1, OPTION2, OPTION3, OPTION4 FROM FESTIVAL WHERE STATE = 4 AND ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ORDER BY IDX DESC
